overview: Zdenko Šturman is a man collecting waste, or rather things the society uses, gets tired of, and throws away. His house and courtyard are nothing but giant “storage space” for waste products piled two metres high. Šturman accumulates things that remind him of his good old younger days. But behind all this is a great man, a positive individual who decided to live by principles different from those of the modern society: no TV, no internet, no stress. A bohemian lifestyle, which in the recent years has turned him into quite a star.
title: It is Coldest in the Shade of Cages
